title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux, running build 20011127, the close button moves below the label.
EB: The close button should remain next to the label even when the view is resized smaller.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to make it smaller.
3. Observe that the close button moves below the label.
